name: Video Frame Interpolation (RIFE)
description: Boost video frame rate using RIFE (Real-Time Intermediate Flow Estimation). Takes an input video and generates intermediate frames to increase smoothness. Supports 2x-8x frame rate multiplication. Use as post-processing after any video generation workflow.

rife47.name: rife47.pth
rife47.note: Auto-downloaded on first use by ComfyUI-Frame-Interpolation

rife49.name: rife49.pth
rife49.note: Newest RIFE version, slightly better quality

requirements.optional_install: ComfyUI-Rife-Tensorrt (for NVIDIA TensorRT accelerated RIFE, ultra-fast)

PARAM_STR_VIDEO_PATH.description: Path to the input video file to interpolate

PARAM_INT_MULTIPLIER.description: Frame rate multiplier (2 = double FPS, 4 = quadruple FPS)

PARAM_INT_OUTPUT_FPS.description: Output video frame rate. Should be input_fps * multiplier.

16fps_to_64fps.description: 4x a 16fps video to 64fps for ultra-smooth motion

notes: RIFE is very fast and lightweight. rife47 is recommended for best quality/speed balance. Set ensemble=true for better quality at slight speed cost. The clear_cache_after_n_frames parameter controls memory usage during long videos.
